data.message: Hi! I'm having an issue with my business page profile feed being completely blank and not having the ability to make a post. Is anyone else having an issue with this?

replies.message: Hi Jason. For questions about Pages on Facebook, please reach out to our team at: http://bit.ly/2bCeViQ. -Jessica

Facebook Hey why did Jason get a reply but I didn't? Is it because mine was a complaint and his wasn't? What's the deal? You replied to him within minutes but my question about the stupid "top stories" is completely ignored......

Dave Schweitzer I feel the same way.  The "report a problem" page is a joke.  It falls on deaf ears.  It only gives me robotic answers and I never hear from a real person.  My group page is a "gonner" .  My hope to recover it is fading.  It sucks.
